course.subject: SOSC
course.name: Population and Society
course.description: This course introduces the main concepts in the field of population studies, contemporary issues concerning the interrelationships between population and social and economic development, and examples of applications of a knowledge of population to wider social concerns, and shows how they relate to issues of concern in research, planning and policy development. Emphasis will be given to contemporary questions and their origins in recent history.

reviews.author: supersherlockxd
reviews.title: 純發洩，不過都好grade既
reviews.comment_content: 基礎 demography，其實言之成理都 ok，主要係要你明關於人口統計學既概念（生老病死），同埋幾個理論。至少對我輕鬆唔使背嘢甚至係 LS common sense。
reviews.comment_teaching:
完全垃圾

個 prof 係 oxford 教開做 visiting prof 既，非常有料。但係佢懶係覺得自己好好笑，香港學生可能會對佢 british humour 好反感。問題係大部分學生都係 exchange／international，唔覺得有咩問題。同埋佢應該唔係太適應香港既讀書模式，

TA 就根本無理取鬧。我交功課個日係醫院冇電冇 wifi，佢都要我第二日交比佢交 grade，最後要同 counseling center 同 ARRO 交涉一個星期佢先肯比個 I grade 比我加時交功課。
reviews.comment_grading:
正呀！

我基本上覺得d嘢太低b就唔上，書都冇溫過就去考 MT Final，MT A-，final 唔知，最後 B。基本上 unit 2 之後已經冇出現。其實只要認真讀可以輕鬆 A range 只係我求其搵個 SA 攝時間先炒到咁姐。

同埋 prof 會搬龍門，最後我地考試係考 essays 唔係 MC，考試前一堂先知格式。
reviews.comment_workload:
expected reading：一星期一個 chapter（內容會考但係唔同上堂重複）

臨時改左 syllabus （自己睇 attachment）。

要做勁多 group work，但係好多都係臨時話做就做。同埋要用一個 app 叫 socrative 做 group work，類似 iPRS 但係會公開所有人 individual 既答案。

reviews.author: IscL
reviews.comment_content:
Fun and interactive class.
a lot of discussion in class and a lot of content to be learned.
reviews.comment_teaching:
the professor is really really fun
implies a lot of real life example and merch them with theories which makes students really easy to understand the concept
a course that you can really learn something after the semester
reviews.comment_grading:
pretty well graded
if you actually do the work instead of handing it without checking B is guranteed
reviews.comment_workload:
super low workload
mainly focus on lesson and discussion instead of actual work
a group project overall therefore it is critical to find a good group to work with

reviews.author: 我要credit畢業
reviews.title: Groupmate 決定你的命運
reviews.comment_content:
Module 1: Course introduction, and ‘what is demography’
Module 2: Population size, growth, density
Module 3: Population structure (age and sex)
Module 4: Mortality
Module 5: Fertility
Module 6: Migration
Module 7: Projections
Module 8: Thinking multidimensionally
Module 9: Individual project
reviews.comment_teaching:
1星期只系compulsory 上1堂，仲要每堂30分鐘就落堂
上堂氣氛幾輕鬆，多數只系簡單講下事前系canvas 預習片的重點，同埋group workbook重要事項，所以其實真正上堂時間都系每星期大約半個鐘
Professor 幾搞笑，好nice，系會同開camera 既學生問候
2個TA(香港+菲律賓)都好願意幫手，唯一問題系菲律賓TA英文唔係幾聽得明
reviews.comment_grading:
Group workbook x7 (40%)
Quizzes x7(15%)
Individual Essay x1 (35%)
Participation, class engagement (10%)

Quizzes
Module 2 7/7
Module 3 5/5
Module 4 3/3
Module 5 3/5
Module 6 5/5
Module 7 3/4
Module 8 5/5

Group workbook
Module 2 18/22
Module 3 29/30
Module 4  25/25
Module 5  30/30
Module 6  29/30
Module 7  36/36
Module 8  35/35


Individual essay 唔知

Overall Grade A-
reviews.comment_workload:
每次上堂前做quiz (3-7題) check 你有無預習睇canvas 片 + pdf
睇下你同你groupmate 既要求同目標系邊，如果只系求mean ，上網搵下d references 做group workbook 就得。要高分就要多references
如果你groupmate 系 free rider 就 RIP ，Groupmate 系大神就直接 A甘濟 因為Group workbook 佔40%
基本上只系individual essay 比較多野做(excel skill+essay)，但系算系無mid term,final 既trade off
重點: 1.要A Range就要多reference，多reference，多reference
         2. 請開sem時開始找適當的group mate / 祈禱prof幫你遍到好groupmate

reviews.author: Harrrrry
reviews.comment_content: Quite fun and simple. Talking about basic demography and is highly understandable no matter which school you come from.
reviews.comment_teaching: Quite different from the HK typical teaching style. Overall acceptable and enjoyable for me. Teaching videos have to be watched before every lesson and a short mc quiz should be done before every lesson. During lesson prof will mainly talk about your gp work done last lesson and time will be given for you to do the next gp work.
reviews.comment_grading: Good grade. Easy getting high marks in gp work if gp mates are normal. Got A- at last.
reviews.comment_workload: Not too much but also not too less. Effort must be gave if you want good grade.

reviews.author: Jc1228
reviews.title: 靚grade course
reviews.comment_content:
Module 1: ‘what is demography’, population size, growth and density
Module 2: Population structure
Module 3: mortality and fertility
Module 4: migration
Module 5: towards the future!
基本上就係教人口改變同其3大factors嘅關係，會攞唔同國家嚟做examples比易明d，會教唔同量度demographics 嘅式，例如生育率。基本上係由數據分析國家人口結構改變或者比較兩者唔同嘅原因
內容幾有趣，較為容易理解，唔會話好悶
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof人幾nice，上堂會吹下水，上堂前要睇片之後再做quiz，所以基本上上堂唔係教書，而係debrief quiz同asm, 上左大概30Mins之後就叫大家分番組做下一份asm，跟住佢同2個ta 會巡breakout room睇下大家進度，佢地會好用心比tips 你做asm，有佢比方向做asm 會易做d

主要教書嘅位都係係片度，佢教得幾仔細，每次睇片都大概要一個鐘到，但係asm 一般都要自己上網search information之後再take reference
reviews.comment_grading:
40% group asm
35% essay
15% online quiz
10% participation and class engagement
Gp asm只要有正常gp mate就可以高分，多d reference 佢就會比高分d你，個mean差唔多每次都係9成左右，online quiz 只要有睇片就識，mc and true or false，又係容易攞滿分。essay就係同做gp asm一樣，跟佢比比嘅flow 嚟做就ok，同埋有excel part 比你執分，participation 就睇你有冇出席同埋有冇睇片就掂。加上係absolute  grading，呢個courses 易攞a range 。
reviews.comment_workload:
Summer sem一個禮拜有3堂，基本上係隔堂上，因為佢會比一堂你去睇片做quiz
Asm大概每1個禮拜一份但係佢通常都係上堂之後一日1200交，同埋佢expect你上堂期間先開始做，所以基本上你得唔夠24小時做asm(1800上堂，加上做asm要搵好多資料for reference 所以可以話有d chur。essay佢比足一個禮拜你做所以冇話好忙

reviews.author: kkkkenkkk
reviews.comment_content:
佢俾好多份pdf and lecture notes俾你參考, 我無乜點睇都A-
主要講人口結構, 點解死亡率高, 生育率低etc.
reviews.comment_teaching: 上堂就係講返上次份project 要點做, 再講今次份project 嘅要求, 然後俾你同teammates breakout room做, 有時佢會入黎睇我地做成點
reviews.comment_workload: 無乜workload, 睇佢幾段片做份短quiz then ok

reviews.author: 科大波佬
reviews.title: good grading; yet self learning is crucial
reviews.comment_content:
three components of population is
1. migration
2. fertility
3 mortality

and you have to study the drivers of the above-mentioned components(like theory, background of different countries , .....)
reviews.comment_teaching:
the teacher Basten is passionate when it comes to teaching ; yet I heard that he is leaving HKUST this year :C
There are 2 TAs , one non local, one local
Both of them are nice
you can talk to the local TA using Cantonese if you wish too :D
reviews.comment_grading:
The grading is super good and linient.

Three parts of grading 1. group work 2. Individual project ad 3. attendance
1. group work
you can basically score above 9.5/10 if you slightly work hard
for me: four out of five group work is full mark
2. individual project
2.1 parts here
1. Basic excel calculation skill(it is very easy, just listen and follow the instructions and basically you can handle it)
2.2 Essay
for this essay , you need to put effort into it
I suggest you to write above 5000 words
also beware of the structure ----dont make it messy and hard to understand
Essay mark not released
grade: A
reviews.comment_workload:
the workload is actually sky high although I just said you can score 9.5/10 if you slightly work hard XDD
we had had lessons from 6pm to 10pm and in the next day 11:59 AM (AM, not PM) we have to hand in our group work------note that they(?) are expecting to see high quality work every time ,also for myself (huh?). So I did not sleep literally during my whole summer semester !!@XHKX FUIK

reviews.author: JW1223
reviews.title: Having trustable group mates will make your life so much easier
reviews.comment_content:
Population structure(age, size, growth,sex,etc.)
Drivers of the population structure
-Mortality
-Fertility
-Migration
Making Forecast
Thinking Multidimensonally
You will learn some basic excel skills to make population charts, e.g. Life Table, Population pyramid, and some line graphs.
8 Modules in total and there are 7 group assignments (Module 2 to Module 8)
As lecture notes are short and are mostly related to analyzing the data, you will have to read some readings if you have no idea how to elaborate on the topics.
Overall speaking, the content was easy, and seems it focus more on the interpretative side.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Basically, there was no teaching during the lecture time.
Instead, the excel skills you are required to make will be taught in the recorded videos, the explanation is clear tho, you just need to follow the steps.
TAs will be helpful during the group working time whereas they will come to the breakout room and try to help you and give you some ideas about the questions. And you can find them by email or inbox when you need to, they will reply to your email in a short time.
reviews.comment_grading:
According to the professor, the absolute grading system is adopted.
40% groupwork
15% quizzes
35% individual project
10% participation

For group work, our group is basically the top 3 groups in the class, which scores around 90% in every assignment. But the mean was generally around 80-85%, so no worry, it's a course with high meanwhile adopting an absolute grading system.

Quizzes are just simple MC questions that the answers are very obvious.

For individual Assignments, this is the key to determine your grade, 40% are from data analytics and 60% from interpretation, follow the grading rubrics and guidelines, it is not hard to get band A in this task.

Grade for Individual Essay: A-
Final Grade:A-

As a year 1 student, I think the grading is good as long as you put effort into your writing.
reviews.comment_workload:
For group assignments, The key to performing well is to divide works to your groupmates evenly and trust them to work as well as they can, for reference, scoring all 8 pts in an interpretative question will require around 2 pages of writing, so you will require trustable groupmates in order to assist you to secure the scores in group assignments. And make sure there is one guy who will unify the format and the citation styles before the submission.

For Individual assignments, the main objectives for the assignment are to let you to show your knowledge and skills learned in this class, which means you will need to cover everything taught in this course, you will make some tables and write a lot to describe and explain the trend of those data. From my experiences, you will need around 6000 words to explain everything from data to explanation, from past to present, and anticipate the future data as long as the justification of them, and comment on the data quality.

As this semester was delivered in online mode, all lectures were having In zoom meetings.

On regular basis, you will only need to attend 3 lectures per two weeks, as the class size is too huge, you will be allocated into group A or B and come in only the group working day and join the debriefing session. The group working day is basically everyone AFK in zoom and finish the assignments, while the briefing day is just briefing on your assignments, which is usually not longer than 30mins and you can watch the lecture videos and finish the quiz in the rest of the time. So the only workload of this course is the individual assignments, make sure don't deadline fight them(which i did) and take some time to grind out a quality essay.

reviews.author: vtsui
reviews.title: 8 group projects 隊友決定你天堂與地獄
reviews.comment_content:
ageing problem
migration
fertility
molarity
calculation of population
life tables

of different countries
reviews.comment_teaching:
There are many lessons that we do not need to attend.
Each week just attend one (two groups alternatively)
Sometimes you just need to attend 15-30 min and just watch the videos by yourself.

The lesson time is short.
reviews.comment_grading:
absolute grading
when finish seven group project, the professor said all of us above or have B+.

Some group projects I have mean or some does not, finally i get A-
reviews.comment_workload:
8 group projects
(There are around 7 questions in each group projects)
If your groupmates will do some for us then it is fine. You just need to two questions each time.

1 individual project (doing all calculations that taught before and write a report about one country's, migration, fertility and molarity.)

7-8 module quiz (5 questions each)
You can finish it in any time, If you listen the lecture video and look at the ppt, then you will know how to do)
The professor just wants to confirm that you have watched his videos.
(I have answered a wrong question before but I send email to professor and ask why it is incorrect as in the video, I find other answers. Although my answer is wrong and have misleading knowledge in the video, the professor still give me marks. He said that I have watched the video and understand the basic content.)

reviews.author: Han_m
reviews.title: Good Common Core
reviews.comment_content: The content was pretty okay for a common core. The focus was on the various demographic processes, characteristics and contexts - basically, how the population has changed over time and how it will change in the future and the reasons for the same. The main topics discussed are: Population size, growth, density, Population Structure, Mortality, Fertility, Migration, Projections, Multidimensional Thinking. A bit of general knowledge regarding world news will definitely help in doing the assignments as the class will focus on various examples from all over the world to explain the concepts. Excel will be used to quite an extent, but the instructions are explained pretty well.
reviews.comment_teaching: The professor was really good and took the classes in a very lively manner. Due to online classes, this class was conducted in a blended learning mode. The format was one lecture for the concepts and review for the assignment, and two were for discussing the group assignments with the group mates and the TAs and the professor - only one of these two group classes have to be attended as the class is divided into two for the same. You have to watch an average of 3 videos every week for the concepts and the quizzes and assignments will be based on the same. The TAs and the professor are very nice and they will help you solve the assignment and answer all queries well.
reviews.comment_grading:
Good grading.
Structured group workbook - 40%
Individual quizzes - 15%
Class participation, attendance, etc. - 10%
Individual assignment - 35%
The mean for all the group assignments is pretty high, so having a good group makes a difference as the work is divided between the members. The TAs discuss the group assignments and sometimes provide hints in the discussion classes, so make sure to attend those. The scoring for these assignments start getting tougher over the semester as everyone scores well and the TAs start having better expectations with the learning curve.
The individual quizzes are pretty easy if you watch the videos.
The individual assignment at the end of the course is very, very important, and can make or break your grade. The assignment will have both technical and interpretive part testing all the concepts taught.
Overall, with some effort, you can get a good grade!
reviews.comment_workload: Regular assignments and quizzes along with class participation, so a good workload - but definitely manageable. Attend the classes, provide your input for the assignment, watch the videos and do the quizzes and it should be fine. Make sure to do your research for the final assignment!

reviews.author: freak_o
reviews.title: OK la
reviews.comment_content: introduction to population.... things about total population, fertility, mortaity... you will make some charts or tables... but no worry, they are pretty simple.
reviews.comment_teaching:
prof. tried to make things simple for us

but I highly recommand ppl. to read the reading to answer that question... (the lecture dun help much in terms of helping you to answer the essay question...but extremely useful for making excel)
reviews.comment_grading:
I got the lowest in nearly all group project....But still get a B+ ><

Don't know the grade of individual project :)
reviews.comment_workload:
a quiz for every module (just watch the video clearly and you can get all correct) (only around 5 MCs question each time)

a weekly group assignment (really depends on groupmates)

an individual assignment at the end of the course (you have to combine all you learned in this courses) (I wrote 3000 words)

citation is so important for all asisgnment... they love to see citation in your work (dun forget that !!!)

dun recommand for year 1 students (I took that during my first year)

reviews.author: shirayuki653
reviews.title: Unexpected grade
reviews.comment_content:
Introduction to demography
Demography on economics and politics
Mortality  and measurement on mortality
Migration and theory of migration
Fertility and  measurement on  fertility
Demography as data science, projection and forecast on population

Actually, the content is quite general and it may be covered in high school(DSE LS module 4,5, etc), and the topics  covered are quite related
reviews.comment_teaching:
Fair
He is quite nice and his lecture is often full of joy. However, he doesn't like students interrupt his teaching, so be careful!
reviews.comment_grading:
Super lenient!! Although the mean is extremely high due to its easy content, I often fall behind mean in assessments and still, I got a B eventually.

My result:
Attendance (15%): Full mark, you just need to sign your name on the attendance sheet
Assignment 1 (25%) :85.5/100(mean:85.3,highest:96)
Assignment 2 (25%):20.3/25(mean:about 21/25)
Final assignment 35%:86/100(mean 90,highest :96)
Overall:86.xx%

It seems  that absolute grading is adopted
reviews.comment_workload:
Quite light
Reading is assigned, but you can skip it and understand what's going on just by powerpoint slides provided.
All assignments can be done within 2-3 days.
Some Lecture session is designated for doing assignments, and so you  do can skip about half of the lectures

reviews.author: chilllahaha
reviews.title: 輕鬆
reviews.comment_content: demography, 人口統計學, 會講到migration theory, fertility 同埋mortality, projection等等。幾輕鬆，無reading requirement, 唔使背嘢，但就比較悶。
reviews.comment_teaching:
其實teaching就麻麻地（可能因為都係common sense居多同係basic demography)，同其他course instructor 差唔多，但professor真係有d料到。
堂上既interaction 比較多，要down一個app答問題（佢會select d 答案出黎+monitor progress所以唔好troll!) 。Professor 平易近人，有時講笑話，氣氛輕鬆。TA個人覺得都ok。
不過Professor心情有時好難捉摸hahaha，唔好interrupt佢上堂progress!
reviews.comment_grading: GOOD Grade. 大家去讀就ok了，no worry
reviews.comment_workload:
3 group assignments+individual workbook.
group assignments都簡單既（唔洗1-2日就搞掂），不過視乎groupmates決定workload啦 (平均分既話一人幾條問題only）
依個course最正之處應該係Professor成日射波（其實係off-class discussion）但off-class discussion基本上無TA 介入，你同groupmates就咁喺whatsapp discuss都無問題。咁就有好多機會唔洗上堂。不過有attendance
